protocol description.ENG: station B protocol for Technogenetics kit
protocol description.ITA: protocollo stazione B per kit Technogenetics

check dry.ENG: check the drying of deepwell plate
check dry.ITA: check the drying of deepwell plate

spin the deepwell.ENG:
Spin the deepwell plate for 20 seconds at room temperature.
Then, put the deepwell plate back onto the magnetic module
spin the deepwell.ITA:
Spinnare la deepwell per 20 sec a RT.
Al termine rimettere la deepwell nel modulo magnetico

deepwell incubation.ENG:
Move the deepwell plate on the temperature module at 60째C.
Incubate for 75 minutes, at least. Set a timer.
Meanwhile, prepare the PCR plate in Station C
When beads have dried, please make the robot continue
deepwell incubation.ITA:
Spostare la deepwell sul modulo di temperatura a 60째C.
Incubare per almeno 75 min, impostare timer.
N.B. PREPARARE LA PCR PLATE NELLA STAZIONE C
Ad asciugatura completa, riattivare il robot

seal the deepwell.ENG:
Seal the deepwell plate with a sticker.
Put the deepwell plate in the thermomixer at 700 rpm, 55째C for 5 minutes, at least.
When the beads are re-suspended, place the deepwell plate onto the magnetic module
seal the deepwell.ITA:
Sigillare la deepwell con un adesivo.
Mettere la deepwell nel thermomixer: 700 rpm 55째C per almeno 5 min.
A biglie risospese, posizionare la deepwell sul modulo MAGNETICO

input PCR.ENG: put the PCR plate in slot 1, onto the aluminum block
input PCR.ITA: mettere la PCR plate nello slot 1, sulla piastra di alluminio

move to PCR.ENG: move the PCR plate to the RT-PCR
move to PCR.ITA: spostare la PCR plate nella RT-PCR
